{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = HAP ax 2.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless AX1800 Gigabit Access Point/Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ax2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD hAP |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = ax 2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7C52-5AXD2AXD |icid = 7442A-C52AX |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6010; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 864<!-- 1.2 GHz 1.8 GHz (+ 1x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |fla1chipmodelfull = <!-- Flash1 full chip info --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = CC:2D:E0, 18:FD:74 |oui = CC:2D:E0, 18:FD:74
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;V7;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, HE80 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/25/2022 |estreldate = 08/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5052; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5052; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2402 |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MikroTik", "C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD" and "hAP ax2 series" :is silkscreened on the board. 24dBm power, 5dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{See also|MikroTik|Netgear WAX610}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ax 2 (C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ax2 '''hAP ax2'''] (C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC) • [https://youtu.be/aRPKUDvNyjM Review] • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC_220807.png BD] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7C52-5AXD2AXD TV7C52-5AXD2AXD] (2022-09-25) • [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/TV7C52-5AXD2AXD FCC Report] :5x GbE ports, 1x PoE in/out, Wi-Fi 6 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/hAPax_220854.pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6010 4x @864MHz, 128MB/1GB • 24V/1.2A :WLAN/SW: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5022/QCN5052/QCA8075 {{FCC ST|07/11/2018|indexme.}}
<!--===Reviews=== *[https://openwrt.org/inbox/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap_ac ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''OpenWrt wiki'''] ([https://openwrt.org/_media/media/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap-ac2_back.jpg PCB image] and [https://openwrt.org/_media/media/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap-ac2_front.jpg front internal image]) *[https://habrahabr.ru/post/351044/ ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''HabraHabr'''] (RU) ([https://hsto.org/webt/m9/b0/zo/m9b0zopdplsty9l9k45ccl3tvkc.jpeg internal images]) *[https://weblance.com.ua/374-obzor-hap-ac2-rbd52g-5hacd2hnd-tc-odin-v-pole-voin-i-alternativa-hex-hap-ac.html ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''WebLance'''] (RU) ([https://weblance.com.ua/uploads/posts/2018-05/1526226406_review_mikrotik_hap_ac2_rbd52g-5hacd2hnd-tc_pic17_cpu_ipq4018.jpg PCB images])
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:65135 ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (RU) ([http://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:65135:10:1.jpg internal image])-->
==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ax 3 (C53UiG+5HPaxD2HPaxD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ax3 '''hAP ax3'''] (C53UiG+5HPaxD2HPaxD) • [https://youtu.be/aRPKUDvNyjM Review] • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/C53UiG5HPaxD2HPaxD_221052.png BD] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7C53-5AXD2AXD TV7C53-5AXD2AXD] (2022-11-09) • [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/TV7C53-5AXD2AXD FCC Report] :4x GbE ports, 1x 2.5GbE PoE in/out, Wi-Fi 6 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/hAPax32_221001.pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6010 4x @1.8GHz, 128MB/1GB • 24V/1.5A :WLAN/SW: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5022/QCN5052/QCA8075/QCA8081 *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ax 2 (C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ax2 '''hAP ax2'''] (C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC) • [https://youtu.be/aRPKUDvNyjM Review] • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/C52iG-5HaxD2HaxD-TC_220807.png BD] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7C52-5AXD2AXD TV7C52-5AXD2AXD] (2022-09-25) • [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/TV7C52-5AXD2AXD FCC Report] :5x GbE ports, 1x PoE in/out, Wi-Fi 6 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/hAPax_220854.pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6010 4x @864MHz, 128MB/1GB • 24V/1.2A :WLAN/SW: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5022/QCN5052/QCA8075 *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ax lite (L41G-2axD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ax_lite '''hAP ax lite'''] (L41G-2axD) • [https://youtu.be/aRPKUDvNyjM Review] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7L41GXD TV7L41GXD] (2022-10-26) • [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/TV7L41GXD FCC Report] :4x GbE ports, 1x PoE in/out, Wi-Fi 6 (2x2 2.4GHz) • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/hAPax_220854.pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7622B 2x @1.35GHz, 128MB/256GB • SW: MT7531BL
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac 3 (RBD53iG-5HacD2HnD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac3 '''hAP ac3'''] (RBD53iG-5HacD2HnD) • [https://youtu.be/dYpRhltO9ig Review] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7D53I-5ACD2ND TV7D53I-5ACD2ND] (2020-09-21) • [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/TV7D53I-5ACD2ND FCC Report] :5x GbE ports, USB 2.0, Wave 2 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/hAP_ac3_200941.pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @716MHz, 128/256MB • *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac 2 (RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC)]] (US) :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac2 '''hAP ac2'''] (tower case) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND] (2018-01-15) :5x GbE ports, PoE, USB 2.0, Wave 2 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://uloz.to/!KboRhNGccV6O/en-datasheet-hap-ac-2-tower-pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @716MHz, 16/128MB • [https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 MT forum] *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac (RB962UiGS-5HacT2HnT)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB962UiGS-5HacT2HnT RB962UiGS-5HacT2HnT] ('''hAP ac''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB962-5ACT2NT TV7RB962-5ACT2NT] :Dual-Concurrent Tripple Chain 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x GbE ports, :POE-out on port 5, SFP, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: E4:8D:8C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @720MHz, QCA9880, 16/128MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac lite (RB952Ui-5ac2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB952Ui-5ac2nD RB952Ui-5ac2nD] ('''hAP ac lite''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB952-5AC2ND TV7RB952-5AC2ND] :Dual-Concurrent 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x FE ports, 24V/1.2A, :POE-out on port 5, 1x USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 4C:5E:0C ([http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-i-testirovanie-hAP-ac-lite review]) :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, QCA9887, 16/64MB <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))--> *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac lite tower (RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC)]] :[https://routerboard.com/RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC] ('''hAP ac lite tower''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB952-5AC2ND TV7RB952-5AC2ND] :Dual-Concurrent 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x FE ports, 24V/1.2A, :POE-out on port 5, 1x USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, QCA9887, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP (RB951Ui-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951Ui-2nD RB951Ui-2nD] ('''hAP''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951UI-2ND TV7RB951UI-2ND] :5x FE ports, POE-out on port 5, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB, 24V/0.8A <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))--> *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP lite (RB941-2nD-TC)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB941-2nD-TC RB941-2nD-TC] ('''hAP lite''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB941-2ND TV7RB941-2ND] :4x FE ports, 2T2R 802.11n, IC ID: 7442A-9412ND, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/32MB <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Winbond (DDR))--> *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP lite classic (RB941-2nD)]] :[https://routerboard.com/RB941-2nD RB941-2nD] ('''hAP lite classic''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB941-2ND TV7RB941-2ND] :4x FE ports, 2T2R 802.11n, IC ID: 7442A-9412ND, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/32MB <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Winbond (DDR))--> *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP mini (RB931-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB931-2nD RB931-2nD] ('''hAP mini''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7931-2ND TV7931-2ND] :3x FE ports, 2T2R 802.11n, IC ID: 7442A-9312ND, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/32MB
